verses.kjv: Be merciful unto me, O God: for man would swallow me up; he fighting daily oppresseth me.
verses.ct: Show me mercy, God, because people are trying to crush me; my enemies attack and pressure me all day long.

verses.kjv: Mine enemies would daily swallow me up: for they be many that fight against me, O thou most High.
verses.ct: Those who hate me try to devour me constantly; so many are fighting against me, Most High.

verses.kjv: What time I am afraid, I will trust in thee.
verses.ct: Whenever I'm afraid, I will place my trust in you.

verses.kjv: In God I will praise his word, in God I have put my trust; I will not fear what flesh can do unto me.
verses.ct: I praise God for his word; I have put my trust in God. I won't be scared of what any human can do to me.

verses.kjv: Every day they wrest my words: all their thoughts are against me for evil.
verses.ct: All day long they twist what I say; every plan they make against me is meant to cause harm.

verses.kjv: They gather themselves together, they hide themselves, they mark my steps, when they wait for my soul.
verses.ct: They band together and lurk in hiding, watching my every move, waiting for a chance to take my life.

verses.kjv: Shall they escape by iniquity? in thine anger cast down the people, O God.
verses.ct: Should they get away with such wickedness? In your anger, bring these people down, God.

verses.kjv: Thou tellest my wanderings: put thou my tears into thy bottle: are they not in thy book?
verses.ct: You have kept track of all my restless wandering. Collect my tears in your bottle â€” aren't they already recorded in your book?

verses.kjv: When I cry unto thee, then shall mine enemies turn back: this I know; for God is for me.
verses.ct: When I call out to you, my enemies will retreat. This much I know: God is on my side.

verses.kjv: In God will I praise his word: in the LORD will I praise his word.
verses.ct: I praise God for his word; I praise the LORD for his word.

verses.kjv: In God have I put my trust: I will not be afraid what man can do unto me.
verses.ct: I have put my trust in God. I will not be afraid of what anyone can do to me.

verses.kjv: Thy vows are upon me, O God: I will render praises unto thee.
verses.ct: I am bound by the promises I made to you, God; I will offer you my praise.

verses.kjv: For thou hast delivered my soul from death: wilt not thou deliver my feet from falling, that I may walk before God in the light of the living?
verses.ct: For you have rescued my soul from death. Won't you also keep my feet from stumbling, so that I can live in God's presence in the light of life?
